Welcome to
Hilton Guam Resort & Spa

Specials & Promotions Room Reservations
Specials & Promotions

Services

  • Dining

    For reservations, call 646 - DINE

  • Hotel Facilities

    Contact the hotel operator for more information, ext. 0

  • Conference & Banquets

    We host day and star-filled night ceremonies for up to 70 guests.

  • Stay with Us

    Enjoy the comfort of a Hilton guest room!

  • Roy's and Roy's Lounge

    A casual and elegant atmosphere perfect for winding down after a long day.

  • Islander Terrace

    A full array of buffet items will satisfy all appetites for breakfast, lunch and dinner.

  • Fisherman's Cove

    Feast on an array of the freshest seafood on island from fish, lobster, crab to shrimp then allow our chefs to prepare your dish to perfection with your choice of seasonings.

  • Fisherman's Express

    Hilton Guam Resort & Spa's newest restaurant, Fisherman's Express! Enjoy specialty shelfish rolls today!

  • Tropics BBQ

    Sumptuous All-you-can-eat Barbecue Buffet

  • Tree Bar

    Refreshing breezes and outdoor beauty is just what you will find at the Hilton Tree Bar.

  • Caffe Cino

    Enjoy the great taste of different aromatic flavored coffee to start up a good day.

For reservations, call 1-671-646-1835, email [email protected] or visit guam.hilton.com. For Dining reservations call 1-671-646-3463

What We Offer

Hotel Facilities

Contact the hotel operator for more information, ext. 0

Promotions

For reservations, call 1-671-646-1835, email [email protected]

Conference & Banquets

We offer an array of business facilities from our Executive Floor and lounge, computer workstations in the lobby to our Business Suites.

Book your stay in paradise

Hilton Guam Resort & Spa sits on 32 acres of prime beachfront property with magnificent views of Two Lover's Point & Tumon Bay.

Click to reserve your room
Call Us Email Us

Visit us on Social Media for specials and promotions

* Same Day Reservations (Mon. - Fri.) must be made at least 5 hours prior to dining time to receive a confirmation email from our F&B department.
* Dining reservations received on weekends or holidays are confirmed on the following business day.
or visit guam.hilton.com. For Dining reservations call 1-671-646-3463*
